page.title: 10Heartsease Area
page.content: Most of the land in this area is residential ,mainly modern semi- detached and terrace houses with both a front and a back garden.All the houses are set back from the road. There are groups of shops scattered around the Heartsease estate. These shops consist of newsagents,food shops ,hot takeaway foods and a post office. There are 4 schools: Heartsease High, Heartsease and First, and Woodside First.Woodside Middle will be closed at the end of the Summer Term due to falling rolls and the older children will all then attend Heartsease Middle . As there is now a large new estate being built close to the Woodside Schools the buildings will be retained for possible future use. There are 4 bus services. There are also 2 churches and a community centre next to Heartsease High School.
